column2: Among 10 randomly picked countries *who use less energy per person than Ireland*, estimate how many won one or more medals in the last Olympics.
If people in a country *use less energy per person than Ireland*, what is the chance (or probability) that it won at least one gold medal in the last Olympics? Give your best guess (between 0 and 1).
Among 10 randomly picked countries *who use less energy per person than Ireland*, guess (from 0 to 10) how many won at least one medal in the last Olympics?
